title: Brave's New Image and Video Search Doesn't Rely on Google or Bing

title: Social Media Bots Played Crucial Role in Inflating Value of FTX-Listed Crypto Assets, Report Finds
description: New analysis from the Network Contagion Research Institute (NCRI) reveals that bots on the social media platform X (formerly Twitter) likely played a major role in amplifying the value of cryptocurrencies tied to the now-defunct FTX exchange and its sister firm Alameda Research. Social Media Bots Boosted FTX-Listed Coins, Says Report Analyzing over three million […]
